name: Space Inversion
description:
Space Inversion is the classic arcade Space Invader style shooter. Battle the invading aliens from outer space.
Features:
* Fast action addictive gameplay.
* No In-App Purchases!
* Multiple Retro style effects including 1970's red LCD mode, Green screen monitor mode and 1980's interlace.
* 3 modes of play "Classic" , "Turbo" and new 'Insane'
* Support for iCade
* Special Bonus Flying Saucer rounds
* HD graphics specially designed for all iPad/iPhone/iTouch including the New Retina Display iPhones
* Direction touch buttons and accelerometer controls
* Left and Right handed controls.

If you like Space Inversion or want to see it improved with new updates please rate the App 5* in order to help us fund future development.

For news on upcoming Apps and updates as well as free promo codes please follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/#!/SilverlineArts
